item.title: Report E-2024060426
item.description:
Report E-2024060426

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-21T15:17:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-12
  • City: SHREVEPORT
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal LSL experienced a UN2922 Santoflex 44PF release from a 55-gallon metal drum. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 55-gallons of product released to a 20â€™ x 8' area of the trailer floor & a 30' x 10' area of the asphalt lot below due to a forklift puncture. The impacted areas were cleaned with a neutral soap solution and absorbents. The damaged drum was placed into a 95-gallon poly overpack. The impacted absorbents, cut up impacted pallets, and all impacted debris were collected and containerized into (13) 55-gallon poly drums. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
